cause.description:
join the cause if your get pissed off daily by things that shouldnt piss the average person off...people rejoice in this anger and travel it out through your fists, a bat, your car, or just you average long blunt object with nails sticking out of it, invite your friends that are always pissed off at somthing to join this cuz in hopes that one day.... ... we angry people will be accepted to yell at whatever the fuck is pissing us off,instead of being called loonatic's for screamin at a child screaming in your ear when your tryingto watch a horror film becuase the imbeciles parents were fuckin stupid enough to let there 10 year old watch a horror film!
1. freedom of speech is a right no matter how loud it is
2. swear words are just a part of extended language skills
3. screamin at stupid people should be a public service
cause.mission: have pissed off people take inititive, and start swingin'
cause.name: mental condition known as: piss off!
